virtue.tooltip: A trait which I am proud of, or that is otherwise helpful and positive.
virtue.label: Virtue

vice.tooltip: a trait which I am ashamed of, something I deal with, or something I fight against.
vice.label: Vice

hope.tooltip: In living this moment, I will have the opportunity to find hope.
hope.label: Moment

brink.label: Brink
brink.tooltip: What I am capable of, when pushed to the edge of fear, hopelessness, and desperation

them.biography: The sun went out 10 days ago, then They came. No one knows where they came from, all we know, is that they are here.
